Text:
do you have or can you get the remaining seasons too?
Thx for this season by the way :)

*** NOTE ABOUT FUTURE SEASONS *** I'm sharing the other seasons at d-addicts.com and afterwards I realized that I could figure out how to set up an external tracker for thepiratebay.org. If anyone else knows how to do this then feel free to set it up for me; otherwise just go over to d-addicts and search for the title. (Season 11 went up today and I'm going to do Season 12 next week...I only have the three seasons.)
I will downnload them right away, but i doubt ill ever watch them... Dont like to miss 9 seasons of story in a series :)
Please seed.   I know that is the lamest comment to see, but this torrent is 5 yrs old with no seeders.  I grew up  watching this on KIKU and now wish to be transported back to that special time.
